rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:prefLabel (SKG-IF labels: labels)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The labels describing a Topic (multiple for multilinguism).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:SubjectTerm * skos:Concept
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasAcronym (SKG-IF labels: acronym, short_name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Acronym used by a Venue.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:ExpressionCollection * foaf:Organization * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vivo:Publisher (SKG-IF labels: publisher archive)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Scientific literature publisher, e.g. Elsevier, Copernicus, Frontiers, Springer, providing metadata and files of scientific publications relative to journals and conferences

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:versionIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: version)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The version for a software or research data product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:inScheme (SKG-IF labels: defined_in)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the URL of the schema of the manifestation type, e.g., a link to the vocabulary of allowed product types.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * skos:Concept
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * skos:ConceptScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Manifestation
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* prism:endingPage -[1]-> xsd:string * prism:startingPage -[1]-> xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coar:c_14cb (SKG-IF labels: metadata only access)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides the possibility of having / handling metadata only access refers to the resources in the Data source (from COAR Access Rights 1.0).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:familyName (SKG-IF labels: family_name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The family name of a Person.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Person
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasRequestDate (SKG-IF labels: request)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an agent is requested to do something, for example a reviewer is requested to write a review of a paper submitted to a journal for publication, or an author is requested to supply a revised version of the paper in response to the reviews received.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: odrl:hasPolicy (SKG-IF labels: policy)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The policies followed by a Data source.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * dcat:DataService
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * odrl:Policy

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:issueIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: issue)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Issue number.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: odrl:target (SKG-IF labels: target)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the types of resources to which the policy applies to. Each item in the list should be compliant with the following terms:
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * odrl:Policy
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * owl:Thing

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:dateCopyrighted (SKG-IF labels: copyright)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been copyrighted.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:endingPage (SKG-IF labels: last)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The ending page.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Manifestation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:embodiment (SKG-IF labels: pages)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the pages where the manifestation in defined (within its Venue).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Manifestation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: co:index (SKG-IF labels: rank)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The rank (i.e., order of appearance) of a Agent with a specific role (e.g., the order of an author in a list) of a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:positiveInteger

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasGrantNumber (SKG-IF labels: grant_number)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique code identifiying the Grant at the funder.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:partOf (SKG-IF labels: in, is_part_of)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Venue identifier for the manifestation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Expression * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Work (SKG-IF labels: Research product, any)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products may be of four types: research literature, research data, research software, or other.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* bido:holdsBibliometricDataInTime -[0..N]-> fabio:BibliometricDataInTime * cito:cites -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * cito:isDocumentedBy -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcterms:abstract -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * dcterms:relation -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * dcterms:title -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:isFundedBy -[0..N]-> frapo:Grant * frbr:partOf -[0..1]-> fabio:Work * frbr:realization -[0..N]-> fabio:Expression * frbr:revisionOf -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * frbr:supplement -[0..N]-> fabio:Work * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> pro:RoleInTime * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> scoro:ContributionSituation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:requires (SKG-IF labels: pid_schemes)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Persistent identifier schemes used to refer to ProductTypes.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * dcterms:Standard
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:IdentifierScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:keyword (SKG-IF labels: keywords)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keywords of a Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:dateAccepted (SKG-IF labels: acceptance)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of acceptance of an entity. Examples of entities to which a date accepted may be relevant are a thesis (accepted by a university examination board) or an article (accepted by a journal editor).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:holdsRoleInTime (SKG-IF labels: affiliations)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: All the affiliations of a Person (à la ORCID).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Person
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SKG-O
rdf:Description.dc:title: The SKG-IF Ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SKG-O, the SKG-IF Ontology, is not yet another bibliographic ontology. Rather it is just a place where existing and complementary ontological entities from several other ontologies, all employed in the Scientific Knowledge Graph Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF), are grouped together for the purpose of providing descriptive metadata compliant with the SKG-IF Data Model.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Journal (SKG-IF labels: journal, journal archive)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data sources for the deposition (submission), preservation, discovery, and access of scientific journal articles (metadata and files), e.g. publishers sites, journal sites, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasCorrectionDate (SKG-IF labels: correction)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which something, for example a document, is corrected.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pso:holdsStatusInTime (SKG-IF labels: access_rights)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The access right for the specific journal.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression * fabio:ExpressionCollection
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pso:StatusInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coar:c_16ec (SKG-IF labels: restricted access)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides the possibility of having / handling restricted access to the resources in the Data source (from COAR Access Rights 1.0).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: schema:Audience
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* schema:audienceType -[1]-> xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cito:isDocumentedBy (SKG-IF labels: is_documented_by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that documents a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:Agent (SKG-IF labels: Agent)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Agent entity represents an individual (e.g., a person, an organisation, or another kind of entity being able to act) who is involved in the creation, publication, dissemination, etc. of a Research product. An Agent can be an author, a reviewer, an editor, a publisher, a researcher, or any other stakeholder involved in the scholarly communication process.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * foaf:name -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCallIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: funding_stream)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The funding stream of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDistributionDate (SKG-IF labels: distribution)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which something is distributed, for example the date on which a preprint of a document is e-mailed to colleagues and other academics by the author(s), or the date on which a printed announcement of forthcoming theatre events is mailed to those those on the theatre's mailing list.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: odrl:aggregate (SKG-IF labels: submission)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides a comprehensive framework for the contribution of research products. Criteria for submitting content to the repository as well as product preparation guidelines can be stated. Concepts for quality assurance may be provided.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:name (SKG-IF labels: name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name of the Data source.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * dcat:DataService * foaf:Agent
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCountry (SKG-IF labels: country)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The country code of an Organisation expressed as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCurrency (SKG-IF labels: funded_amount)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Amount funded for a Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:float

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:supplement (SKG-IF labels: is_supplemented_by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that are supplement of a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasFundingAgency (SKG-IF labels: funding_agency)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The local identifier of an Organisation funding the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * frapo:FundingAgency

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coar:c_f1cf (SKG-IF labels: embargoed access)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides the possibility of having / handling embargoed access refers to the resources in the Data source (from COAR Access Rights 1.0).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scoro:ContributionSituation
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* co:index -[0..1]-> xsd:positiveInteger * pro:isHeldBy -[1]-> foaf:Agent * pro:relatesToOrganization -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> pro:Role * scoro:withContribution -[0..N]-> scoro:Contribution

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:RoleInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* co:index -[0..1]-> xsd:positiveInteger * pro:isHeldBy -[1]-> foaf:Agent * pro:relatesToOrganization -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> pro:Role * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> scoro:ProjectRole * scoro:withContribution -[0..N]-> scoro:Contribution * tvc:atTime -[0..1]-> ti:TimeInterval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literal:hasLiteralValue (SKG-IF labels: value)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The external identifier.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Expression
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcat:accessService -[0..1]-> dcat:DataService * dcterms:created -[0..1]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:dateAccepted -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:dateCopyrighted -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:issued -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:modified -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * dcterms:valid -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasAccessDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasCorrectionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDateCollected -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDateReceived -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDecisionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDepositDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasDistributionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasEmbargoDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasRequestDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasRetractionDate -[0..N]-> xsd:dateTime * fabio:hasSequenceIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * frbr:embodiment -[0..1]-> fabio:Manifestation * frbr:partOf -[0..1]-> fabio:Expression * prism:edition -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:issueIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:versionIdentifier -[0..1]-> xsd:string * prism:volume -[0..1]-> xsd:string * pso:holdsStatusInTime -[1]-> pso:StatusInTime * rdf:type -[0..1]-> skos:Concept

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isHeldBy (SKG-IF labels: by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of an Agent.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime * scoro:ContributionSituation
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Agent

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcat:DataService (SKG-IF labels: Data source)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Data source is a service or platform where a Research product (its metadata and files) is stored, preserved, and made discoverable and accessible. A data source is described by the EOSC Profile for data sources (https://wiki.eoscfuture.eu/display/PUBLIC/D.+v4.00+EOSC+Data+Source+Profile).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcat:theme -[0..1]-> owl:Thing * dcterms:conformsTo -[0..N]-> dcterms:Standard * dcterms:coverage -[1]-> owl:Thing * dcterms:subject -[0..N]-> owl:Thing * foaf:name -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * odrl:hasPolicy -[0..N]-> odrl:Policy * schema:audience -[0..N]-> schema:Audience

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Catalog (SKG-IF labels: aggregator)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: services for the aggregation of metadata about research products (and other entities) that are mainly collected (aka harvested) from data sources via APIs and then possibly curated/enriched by end-users, e.g. BASE, NARCIS, GESIS, B2FIND, OpenAIRE Research Graph

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prism:seriesTitle (SKG-IF labels: series)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the conference or book series.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:ExpressionCollection
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: odrl:archive (SKG-IF labels: preservation)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides a comprehensive framework for the long-term preservation of the research products. Principles aims and responsibilities must be clarified. An important aspect is the description of preservation concepts to ensure the technical and conceptual utility of the content.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDepositDate (SKG-IF labels: deposit)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been deposited, for example in a library, repository, supplementary information archive, database or similar place of document or information storage.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pso:StatusInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* dcterms:description -[0..1]-> xsd:string * pso:withStatus -[1]-> pso:PublicationStatus

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:TimeInterval
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* ti:hasIntervalEndDate -[0..1]-> xsd:dateTime * ti:hasIntervalStartDate -[1]-> xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:issued (SKG-IF labels: publication)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of formal issuance of a resource (e.g. a publication or a patent).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:supports (SKG-IF labels: beneficiaries)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisations identifiers funded by the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:hasIntervalEndDate (SKG-IF labels: end)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end datetime (if any) of the Grant. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:SubjectTerm (SKG-IF labels: topic, Topic)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Topic describes the scientific disciplines, subjects and keywords potentially relevant for a Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * skos:prefLabel -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:title (SKG-IF labels: titles, title)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The titles of a Research product (multiple for multilinguism).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:ExpressionCollection * fabio:Work * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:page (SKG-IF labels: documented_at)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the URL of the document that describes the policy.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * odrl:Policy
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Document

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:homepage (SKG-IF labels: website)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An URL poiting to the website of the funded project.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Document

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Database (SKG-IF labels: scientific database)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Scientific Databases intended to store structured information about scientific entities, e.g. PROTDB, ENA, ECRIN Studies Database

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frbr:revisionOf (SKG-IF labels: is_new_version_of)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Research products identifiers that are prior versions of a given Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:Work

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: schema:audienceType (SKG-IF labels: audience_type)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the type of the audience based on the vocabulary Jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * schema:Audience
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prov:wasAssociatedWith (SKG-IF labels: associated_with)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the `local_identifier` of the Agent responsible for the topic relation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * prov:Activity
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Agent

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bido:holdsBibliometricDataInTime (SKG-IF labels: topics)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Objects referring to Topic covered by the Research product.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * fabio:BibliometricDataInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:ResearchInformationSystem (SKG-IF labels: cris system)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A current research information system (CRIS) is an information system to store, manage and exchange contextual metadata for the research products funded by a research funder or conducted at a research-performing organisation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isDocumentContextFor (SKG-IF labels: contributions)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Agents that contributed to a Venue.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:ExpressionCollection

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:created (SKG-IF labels: creation_date, creation)

In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a number of the manifestation within the Venue (e.g., chapter number).

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:subject (SKG-IF labels: disciplines)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The disciplines for which a Data source is dedicated. The disciplines must be specified using the Library of Congress Classification codes, available at https://id.loc.gov/authorities/classification (e.g. `PA3000-PA3049` for classical literature). In case a Data source is discipline agnostic, the string `all` should be specified.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * dcat:DataService
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * owl:Thing

rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* prov:wasAssociatedWith -[1]-> foaf:Agent * rdf:value -[1]-> xsd:float

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasDateCollected (SKG-IF labels: collected)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which some item has been collected, for example the data gathered by means of questionnaires.

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression

In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:Repository (SKG-IF labels: repository)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: services for the deposition, preservation, discovery, and access of research products metadata and files, e.g. PANGAEA, Zenodo, B2SHARE, EGI AppDB, BioTools

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provenance information tracking the origin of the relation between a Topic and a Research product. Each topic provenance object has the following properties:
rdf:Description.dc:description:

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:withRole (SKG-IF labels: role)

In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:Role * scoro:ProjectRole

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The contributions that an Agent had in a Research product. Each element in the list is a String compliant with the CRediT taxonomy (https://credit.niso.org), i.e.,
rdf:Description.dc:description:

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: describe if the journal is open access (`open`), closed access (`closed`), or hybrid (`hybrid`).

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pso:StatusInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pso:PublicationStatus

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tvc:atTime (SKG-IF labels: period)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time period where the Person was affiliated with an Organisation. It includes the following information:
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * ti:TimeInterval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:Grant (SKG-IF labels: Grant)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The entity Grant describes funding awarded to a Agent by a funding body. These bodies, both public and private, can be funders, foundations, governments, agencies or institutions.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcterms:abstract -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * dcterms:temporal -[0..1]-> ti:TimeInterval * dcterms:title -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * foaf:homepage -[0..1]-> foaf:Document * frapo:hasAcronym -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:hasCallIdentifier -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:hasCurrency -[0..1]-> xsd:float * frapo:hasCurrencyCode -[0..N]-> xsd:string * frapo:hasFundingAgency -[0..1]-> frapo:FundingAgency * frapo:hasGrantNumber -[0..1]-> xsd:string * frapo:supports -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * prism:keyword -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start datetime of the Grant. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:modified (SKG-IF labels: modified)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date on which an entity has been modified.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fabio:hasEmbargoDate (SKG-IF labels: embargo)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date before which an entity should not be published, or before which a press release should not be reported on. For open-access journal articles, the embargo date is the date before which availability of the open-access version of the article is restricted by the publisher, following subscription-access availability of the published work.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Expression
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:temporal (SKG-IF labels: duration)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The duration of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * ti:TimeInterval

In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relevant Organisation identifiers associated with a Research product, in case the individual affiliations of an Agent are not available.

In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * fabio:Work
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.dc:description:

* bido:withBibliometricData -[1]-> fabio:SubjectTerm * prov:wasGeneratedBy -[0..N]-> prov:Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This policy provides the possibility of having / handling Data source resources that are immediately and permanently online (from COAR Access Rights 1.0).
